means: 演变，进化( evolve的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

sentence.Network_en: The idea evolved from a drawing I discovered in the attic.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种想法是从我在阁楼里发现的一幅画得到启发的。

sentence.Network_en: Man was evolved from an ancestor that was probably arboreal.
sentence.Network_cn: 人大概是从住在树上的祖先进化而来的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: man is evolved from lower forms of life ., 人是从低级生物进化而来的.
some people still do not believe that man evolved from monkeys ., 有些人依然不相信人是由猴子演变而来的.

it is pure speculation , but music may be built on emotions originally evolved to respond to important natural sounds , but which blossomed a hundred-fold .这是纯粹揣测，但是音乐也许建立在最初对进化过程中对重要自然声音做出响应的情绪之上，只不过扩大了一百倍。
the modern automobile evolved from the horse and buggy ., 现代汽车是从单马马车演化而来的.

list.abs: evaporator 蒸发器evolvent 渐开线，切展线examination ①检查②研究，分析
托福词汇表_百度文库 ... inhabit 栖息于，居住在 evolve 进化 evolution 进化.
人教版_高中英语_选修9单词 - 豆丁网 ... rot,vt. & vi. 腐烂；腐败 evolve,vt. 发展；进展；进化 evolution,n. 演变；进化.

entry.def: When animals or plants evolve, they gradually change and develop into different forms.

example.ex: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females...
example.tran: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

example.ex: Maize evolved from a wild grass in Mexico.
example.tran: 玉米是从墨西哥的一种野生禾本植物进化而来的。

entry.def: If something evolves or you evolve it, it gradually develops over a period of time into something different and usually more advanced.

example.ex: ...a tiny airline which eventually evolved into Pakistan International Airlines...
example.tran: 最终发展成巴基斯坦国际航空公司的一家小型航空公司

example.ex: Popular music evolved from folk songs...
example.tran: 流行音乐从民歌演变而来。

auth_sentence.content: Insects are the only invertebrates to have evolved flight.
auth_sentence.res_content: Insects are the only invertebrates to have evolved flight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Insects are the only invertebrates to have evolved flight.

auth_sentence.content: How have the war films of our time evolved?
auth_sentence.res_content: How have the war films of our time evolved?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How have the war films of our time evolved?

auth_sentence.content: Or develop analogs to what has evolved in Nature.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or develop analogs to what has evolved in Nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or develop analogs to what has evolved in Nature.

Sentence.sentence: Since then it has evolved into a global crisis.
LOL has evolved into something much subtler and sophisticated and is used even when nothing is remotely amusing.
